name: A Memory
description:
A Memory (classic SIMON game) is a brilliant implementation of the classic family favourite, Bring different Button Sound and Gameover sound.

The computer generated sequence gets faster with each turn - it'll drive you crazy! What's the longest sequence you can hold in your head?

FEATURES:
You can set your interesting sound when playing with game.
You can challenge your score with game center players.

Don't miss it! It's our childhood memory! Any feedback or feature request, please let me know azhuona@gmail.com
